parameter.name: id
parameter.description: The particular Id of the resource

parameter.name: code
parameter.description: The code that is to be translated. If a code is provided, a system must be provided

parameter.name: system
parameter.description: The system for the code that is to be translated

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: The version of the system, if one was provided in the source data

parameter.name: valueSet
parameter.description: Identifies the value set used when the concept (system/code pair) was chosen

parameter.name: codeableConcept
parameter.description: A full codeableConcept to validate. The server can translate any of the coding values

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: Identifies the value set in which a translation is sought

parameter.name: dependency
parameter.description: Another element that may help produce the correct mapping
